meanings.definition: Relating to the description of the universe.
meanings.sent1: The cosmographic view of the stars filled her with wonder.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use cosmographic tools to study the vastness of space.
meanings.sent3: The cosmographic explanation of the galaxy's formation was out of this world!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cosmographic map, charting the mysteries of the cosmos.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's cosmographic diagrams made learning about space easy and fun.

meanings.definition: A map or chart of the universe.
meanings.sent1: He studied the cosmographic to navigate through the galaxies.
meanings.sent2: The cosmographic displayed the positions of celestial bodies.
meanings.sent3: The aliens requested a copy of our cosmographic for their collection.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a vast cosmographic, full of unexplored territories.
meanings.sent5: The cosmographic on the wall guided travelers through the cosmos.
